verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he that considers <S%H7919><s%> the poor <S%H1800><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will deliver <S%H4422><s%> him in time <S%H3117><s%> of trouble <S%H7451><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will preserve <S%H8104><s%> him <S%H2421><s%>, and keep him alive; and he shall be blessed <S%H833><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>: and you will not deliver <S%H5414><s%> him unto the will <S%H5315><s%> of his enemies <S%H341><s%>.
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will strengthen <S%H5582><s%> him upon the bed <S%H6210><s%> of languishing <S%H1741><s%>: you will make <S%H2015><s%> all his bed <S%H4904><s%> in his sickness <S%H2483><s%>.
I said <S%H559><s%>, Lord <S%H3068><s%>, be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me <S%H7495><s%>: heal my soul <S%H5315><s%>; for I have sinned against you <S%H2398><s%>.
My enemies <S%H341><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> of me <S%H4191><s%>, When shall he die, and his name <S%H8034><s%> perish <S%H6><s%>?

And if he come <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> me <S%H1696><s%>, he speaks vanity <S%H7723><s%>: his heart <S%H3820><s%> gathers <S%H6908><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> to itself <S%H3318><s%>; when he goes abroad <S%H2351><s%>, he tells it <S%H1696><s%>.
All that hate <S%H8130><s%> me whisper <S%H3907><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against me <S%H2803><s%>: against me do they devise my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
A evil <S%H1100><s%> disease <S%H1697><s%>, say they <S%H3332><s%>, cleaves fast unto him <S%H7901><s%>: and now that he lies he shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%>.

Yes <S%H7965><s%>, my own familiar friend <S%H376><s%>, in whom I trusted <S%H982><s%>, which did eat <S%H398><s%> of my bread <S%H3899><s%>, has lifted up <S%H1431><s%> his heel against me <S%H6119><s%>.
But you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me <S%H6965><s%>, and raise me up, that I may requite them <S%H7999><s%>.
By this I know <S%H3045><s%> that you favor <S%H2654><s%> me <S%H341><s%>, because my enemy does not triumph over me <S%H7321><s%>.
And as for me <S%H8551><s%>, you uphold me in my integrity <S%H8537><s%>, and set <S%H5324><s%> me before your face <S%H6440><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from everlasting <S%H5769><s%>, and to everlasting <S%H5769><s%>. Amen <S%H543><s%>, and Amen <S%H543><s%>.
